meanings.definition: Able to be placed or situated in a particular position.
meanings.sent1: The book is placeable on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The vase is placeable on the table.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle piece was placeable in the wrong spot, creating a funny picture.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was placeable in the memories of all who met her.
meanings.sent5: The key was placeable in the lock, opening the door to a new adventure.

meanings.definition: Capable of being put in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The chair is placeable in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The painting is placeable on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a placeable box to hide in and play a game of peek-a-boo.
meanings.sent4: His words were placeable in her heart, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The seeds were placeable in the soil, ready to grow into beautiful flowers.
